flawed_nl_solution:
Before dinner, she had 56+8=<<56+8=64>>64 ounces of CM.
Before drinking 8 ounces of CM during lunch, she had 64+8=<<64+8=73>>73 ounces of CM.
Before buying 64 ounces of CM, she had 73-64=<<73-64=9>>9 ounces of CM.
And before breakfast, she had 9+8=<<9+8=17>>17 ounces of chocolate milk.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 72, not 73. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
